author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Putin spoke to Iranian president: Kremlin
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke by telephone with his Iranian counterpart Hassan Rouhani, the Kremlin said in a statement on Tuesday.
The statement said the two leaders talked about the search for a political settlement in Syria, the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, and the conflict in Yemen. They also spoke of their determination to implement the international deal on Iranâ€™s nuclear program, the Kremlin said.
Reporting by Katya Golubkova; Writing by Christian Lowe; Editing by Alison Williams
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
